conversation.message: We are formally applying for the open position at Nursery_C. This nursery is our absolute first choice, and we highly value the educational environment you provide.

This strategy maximizes my chance of securing my Rank 1 choice immediately, leveraging the fact that the parents with higher priority at N_C have stronger preferences for other nurseries where they also hold high priority positions (N_D and N_B). I will send a formal [APPLY].
